# AlarmPresentationState.Mode.alert(_:)

**Case**

A mode indicating an alarm emits an alert.

## Declaration

```swift
case alert(AlarmPresentationState.Mode.Alert)
```

## Discussion

An alarm can only be in one of these states at a time.

## Creating an alert

- **AlarmPresentationState.Mode.Alert**: A value that indicates the current state of an alarm.
